website_summaries.verdict: An affordable blender that is best suited for lighter kitchen tasks.
pros: Can chop hard vegetables and nuts
cons: Whisk is not suited for mashing potatoes and creaming root vegetables

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item Shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as well as a Bella Immersion blender the same day. Opened and used the Bella the same day. Extremely pleased with the Bella. The Hamilton was dirty, the whisk attachment was broken and the blender gets very hot in your hand like it is burning up. Unfortunately I did not open and inspect the Hamilton Blender until today and the return window has closed. I have never had an issue like this before from anything I have ever ordered from Amazon. They said the packing may be damaged and I didn't care about that. But I expected it to work! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KTW

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blender for about a year now and I LOVE it! I use it at least 2-3 times a week! I have yet to use the food processor but the blender and whisk have been fantastic - the whisk attachment does tend to shoot whatever you are using it for out of the bowl so make sure you use a bigger bowl than you normally would to help minimize the spillage. It gets the job done though! LOVE it and have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: Get cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am not a great cook, and any excuse not to cook totally stops me in my tracks. With this, I have been cooking more than I usually would.. It scrambles eggs, mixes pancake batter, and is an overall good mixer. It is so easy to clean, It takes seconds, and it's back in the box. I think if it came with a plastic case, it would be even better. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 1 year -using it only with liquids
customer_reviews.text: After one year of usage it was simply destroyed! I was using that ONLY with liquids and the pieces were destroyed after maximum only 20 times of usage. Really disappointed based on the price that I paid for this. Now it cannot be used anymore as it doesn't work. Note that I never washed it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Eirini

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Projects but is Not Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and works great for small soap making projects. You can only blend in short bursts otherwise the motor heats up very quickly. Air also gets trapped in the blade cover but I just tip the blender at an angle to let the air out before blending. Works great and good price. If you need something heavy duty I'd recommend investing more money into something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Mixing Wand Does Not Lock in Place and Can Fall Off.
customer_reviews.text: The mixing wand does not lock in place properly. The whisk attachment locks in place solidly with a discernible click, but the mixing wand does not. It is loose and comes loose and falls off easily. I thought the first mixer might have been defective and sent it back for a replacement, but the replacement had the same problem, so this is obviously a design flaw that Hamilton Beach needs to address. I did not the mixer because of the defect, but I am giving it one star because of the poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were sturdier
customer_reviews.text: this product does everything it says it should. I just wish it were sturdier. I had a previous model, that finally gave out and got this to replace. It doesn't feel as sturdy, and when using it the first few times there has been an "electric" smell when it's being used. The quality, compared to the past model, just feels cheaper but it does everything it says it should. Not really a complaint, but not really praise.
customer_reviews.author: gpet73

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It really works great and is very convenient, it works excellent for blending juice drinks, frothing green tea with the egg beater attachment. And the blender container works great for making sauces, guacamole, salsa and numerous other foods, it is also very easy to clean, a lot easier and quicker than a table top blender. The motor is also very powerful but also very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, versatile kitchen helper.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I wanted an affordable immersion blender with a full stainless steel wand. So the mini food processor gizmo was a bonus I didn't expect to use often, but have to admit its kinda handy for small tasks that don't require the power and capacity of my Cuisinart. Does a fine job with nuts and herbs but crushing ice might cause damage. Haven't used the whisk attachment yet but may give that a go as well.
customer_reviews.author: PL36

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to cook so I don't use this often, just to blend marinates with the blender tip and to finely chop roasted red peppers. The motor has a hefty feel to it, the 2 speeds are easy to change while operating, and it easy to control directionally. When using the chopper, the bottom of the provided cup seem to stay put on the counter due to a rubber pad on the bottom. My only concern is that the cup and lid are plastic so I don't know how long it will last. But I've used it 3 or 4 times and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: catlover2027

customer_reviews.title: Amazing compact blender
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price! Works perfectly for making smoothies, sauces, and mixing of any kind. Perfect for a dorm room or a small bedroom apartment. My roommates and I use it every day. Super easy to clean, super easy to use. Powerful motor makes it work like a dream. Only con is the pieces don't come in any type of storage unit so we keep the pieces loose in the drawer. This didn't bother me but it bothered my roommate.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Usability issues. Would suggest buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: The design for this is weird. Using the chopper is a pain because the machine on top actually screws on the same direction as the lid closing on the chopper container. This way whenever I want to open the chopper container, it first unscrews the machine and then I struggle to open the lid. The people who designed this should have at least tested it whether it is usable or not. Don't know how this got good reviews and nobody raised this issue. Would suggest to buy a different brand/set if you can. Do not go for the low price here.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully! It's so easy to clean. The motor is plenty powerful for blending anything I've tried. I've chopped/minced nuts, onions, and more in the processor part and I just love it. I haven't used the wish too much but the one time I did, it wished way too fast and splattered. I like that it has 2 speeds too. Because when I'm making a smoothie I use the lesser speed to start then kick it up to the second to get the oats nicely blended.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We started Whole30 and bought this to use for making mayonaise and creamy salad dressings. I almost bought a different one but after reading several articles comparing different brands, that unanimously said this was the best budget one by far, I got this one. I'm incredibly happy with the purchase. We have used it many, many times for more than what we originally bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B. Mason

customer_reviews.title: the most annoying part is you don't get replacement parts for it
customer_reviews.text: the chopper broke off while I was chopping carrots - there wasn't too much quantity in it and was very disappointing when this happened.. the most annoying part is you don't get replacement parts for it, so the chopper is literally of no use to me now - tried a few options to glue it up but nothing helped and all in vein :( I've tried searching a lot on both Amazon and Hamilton Beach sites but nothing! I really liked the product when I bought it and had some good expectations from it but it failed miserably..
customer_reviews.author: Tejal Nerkar

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to operate and switch between attachments. The problem is the whisk attachment broke on first use and the food processor leaves bits of black plastic in your food. The stick blender does not operate as well as others I have had in the past. They have used cheap plastic in the wrong places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, affordable addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set! It's so affordable and so functional. I use it constantly. It is a very powerful little thing with only two settings (apparently crushingly fast and brutally fast) so you really have to pay attention to what you're doing. I wouldn't use the whisk attachment for batter, but the immersion blender and the chopper are seriously amazing. I make amazing guacamole in it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach has a winner with this one.
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this hand blender! I purchased this for my wife at Christmas time, and she has already decided to use it as her primary source of blinding, chopping, and mixing in the kitchen. She loves the fact that she can puree some of her dishes (such as her superbly delicious butternut squash soup) right in the pot, completely eliminating the need to remove it to a different container for that step before returning it to the cooking pot. So far it has performed great, and we have had absolutely zero problems with it. I highly recommend this hand blender to make your cooking a little easier in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This handheld is HEAVY duty! My husband makes his protein shakes with the mixer. Although the mixer part is a little wider, so we worried that it wouldn't blend in a regular cup, but it does an excellent job. We were also soooo excited about the chopper that came with this hand blender. That thing ROCKS! I just chopped cauliflower last night flawlessly. This product is worth every penny...and it's price was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Paige A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size is helpful.
customer_reviews.text: This blender just arrived and we put it to good use. I bought it because it was smaller and suitable for my elderly mother. The attachments are a bit awkward to put on, but we plan to use just for immersion blending, so it will be possible to leave that attached and just wipe/rinse clean. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I always use the hand blender for soups and the mixed for batters. I have had it for months. I do not have any reservation. Not too loud, easy to clean, never stained with food. Small and light product. I would recommend it for anyone looking for not very advanced food processor
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how often I would use this item so I decided to get a less expensive model. I'm so glad I did. It turns out I use this device almost every day & this cheap little model is wonderful! I make smoothies using frozen fruit several times a week & it grinds it right up. Puree soup right in the pot without any problems. It cleans up so easily too. I have used the chopping cup that comes with with it & it worked great for my onions. I have not used the wisk. So if you are wondering if you'll use it...you will. If you are wondering if you need to buy the $80 one...you dont.
customer_reviews.author: amy h combs

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase due to negative feedback..but I have used this 4 times so far and it chops my parsley, cilantro, and onion with seconds. Saves me a lot of time and its easy to clean. BEWARE though, blade is extremely sharp. I do not recommend putting it in bottom of full sink. could easily get cut as I did. that was my fault of course.. I would buy this again AND as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Georges

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I read an online review of a performance test of seven hand blenders. It concluded that the All Clad, at $100, blew the reszt away, except for the $20 Hamilton Beach, which was almost as good. So I bought the HB, and they were right -- it really does the job. Easy to use, tough, powerful. It may not be quite as good as the All Clad, but unless you are super-serious, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Old Squid

customer_reviews.title: Good price and does what i need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous brandname that worked like a horse before it broke. There were nicer looking ones available but the price difference led me to buy this one. So far I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rika

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because we regularly make Indian food with sauces and we usually use a blender to grind them. This product made cooking so easy for us. And for the price, it sure does a lot. Everything works well but the plastic on the processor seems cheap. I suggest to not hold the grind button for too long or you'll have a bad time. Just pulse or hold for up to 3 seconds. Not more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Bansode

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a different brand and had nothing but troubles. I have used this Hamilton Beach hand blender now a couple times and it works perfectly without issue. It has a sleek design and all the pieces came as expected. I do not know why you would need to spend twice as much or more for a similar product. Hamilton Beach has always been a pretty reliable brand for me, and this product was no different. I love using a hand blender to make homemade mayo and soups and smoothies. It offers super easy cleanup, too. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Super handy! Fast & easy!
customer_reviews.text: A French friend of mine made me some deliciously simple soup. I thought it had cream in it, it was so thick. Nope, just puréed with a stick blender! I bought this one after reading all the reviews. I figured for the money, why not give it a try. I wasn’t sure how often I’d actually use it, but to be honest, it’s so handy and quick, I’ve used it several times to whip up a tasty soup and now I want to find more recipes to try!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia B

customer_reviews.title: Beset kitchen gadget ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useful kitchen gadget ever invented. I use it for pureeing soup. So convenient. Wish I had discovered this item years ago when I used to have to pour hot soup in batches into my food processor to pure the soup. That made a big mess with several items to wash. So glad I bought this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Tuel

customer_reviews.title: Some what disappointments.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stick blender, but have trouble detaching the different components which is a bummer. I'm afraid it's going to break because I have to put so much pressure to get it to break lose to exchange attachments . And it was like this from the get go. I feel like this is going to reduce the longevity of the unit. And it's way to much hassle to return,and it's really not broken completely just difficult to take apart, I'm sure this not normal. It's take the enjoyment out of this being a quick tool to reach for and use.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Hilk

customer_reviews.title: YES you need this
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a replacement for a nice blender that I had misplaced...this is a great value, great product...I found my expensive one and gave it away as I absolutely love the Hamilton Beach. I don't use the other acessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Saves time and cleans up very easily.
customer_reviews.text: The hand blender I had for many years finally quit working and I replaced it with this one. I like it better than my old one. The fact that you can remove the blade section makes for very easy cleaning. I really like the whisk attachment as well. I haven't used the chopper yet so I can't review that. But the size looks much better than my old one - which was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I font clean it in dishwasher. I want all the metal parts to be dried thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Love it!!! Use it all the time instead of heavy grinding machine or blender or mixer. Powerful enough to grate anything from bread to ice. Mostly I use the bowl for grinding onions - still make me cry, but that is nothing compared to what I had to go thru before
customer_reviews.author: Dama Tuz

customer_reviews.title: Blender is good but not great either
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I mix something, the attachment keeps falling off. Blender is good but not great either. I used it a lot and and am thinking to get a 5 star product now. This is good to have to use once a year, but if wvery week, don’t bother buying.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: deadly
customer_reviews.text: after no more than 6 uses the motor started smoking. deadly around wet environment. too little sleep for the chinese assembly line workers.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, and Hamilton beach does it again! I have a few of their products and they are far and away as good as any expensive option at the mall. I use this weekly, for pureeing and chopping, and the handy food processor attachment really makes this so practical to have if you don't have the space for a big and bulk regular food processor. The only issue with this is sometimes the lid doesn't click and it takes awhile to figure out how to latch it on completely, but other than that I have nothing bad to say!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Deceseri

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this as a gift for my birthday. I make a ton of soups and stews in the colder months and I have always wanted an immersion blender. It was order through Amazon Prime and arrived within the 2-day time frame. The day it arrived I washed everything and used every attachment while making dinner. I really love that it has 2 speeds and he simple it is to switch from one to the other! I cannot wait for winter so I can use this on a weekly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 10 year old Hamilton with this one. It is loud, but very powerful. My first use the unit smoked a bit, but I think that was just residual stuff from the manufacturing process. I will update this rating if I experience issues. The blade bowl is larger than it looks in the picture. I don't suggest using it to chop ice, but it is good for herbs and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job at what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job at what it is supposed to do. The first one they sent me was a used unit, but the customer service was helpful and sent me a replacement for the return. So far I've used the "musher" attachment to make mashed potatoes and it sort of "whipped" them, the texture was very different from when I mush it with the hand musher, I loved it! The whisk seems real handy for making fast scrambled eggs, way smoother than doing it by hand. The motor on this one is strong. I am happy I chose this model!
customer_reviews.author: OneDollOneHat

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad : see review
customer_reviews.text: The hand blender is great for immersion blending. However the other unit broke the first time I used it. Had to throw it out. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift bc it was given to me as a gift and I loved the one I recieved! I have made a couple soups with this blender and so far I am impressed. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I've had one for several years that works great and was looking for the same performance from a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of junk. I've had one for several years that works great and was looking for the same performance from a similar product. The pieces don't stay together causing the parts to become stripped. I'm very disappointed and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. L. CROW

customer_reviews.title: Good but feels kind of cheap
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and is good for the price.. but is not really good quality and the plastic feels kind of cheap.. also takes time to lock in place .
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Alkateb

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blender for everyday
customer_reviews.text: A nice blender for the price. It doesn't have the "weight" you feel in a higher quality product, but I've had it for a few months and it's showed no signs of slowing down. I love using it to make blended soups without having to dirty my regular blender. The added food processor attachment is great for small jobs. Would definitely recommend to someone who needs a sleek little blender for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 light uses
customer_reviews.text: The piece of plastic attached to the blade of the food processor broke off after the second use for light chopping. The immersion blender is very weak--mine is garbage in less than a month with about 2-3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kasha

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but missing an appropriate sized cup
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hand blender. Powerful and functional. Best one I have ever used. The only problem is that it doesn't come with the cup in the appropriate size. I use it with a pitcher I bought just for that, but the fact that it's bigger than the blender makes it difficult to use. And if you try using it in a regular bowl you'll make a mess, because the blender is so powerful it spills everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Leo

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well. Easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.text: It has enough power for making mango lassi kind of thick drinks. Easy to clean as blade detaches completely off motor. Easy to store as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pravin Pathak

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight but what good is it if the attachments do NOT stay on!?! The mixer/blender comes off every time I try to use it. As for the other two attachments, the whip is to small and low grade for the hand motor.The food processor attachment seems to work okay but who wants to buy it as a food processor.... I was buying it as a hand blender. I have a SMALL food processor ( large one too!) why would I want another one that only processes LESS than two - three cups (which my small one already does).
customer_reviews.author: 65schwinn

customer_reviews.title: Love this! so many attachments for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I couldn't believe the price compared to a lot of other tools like this I was looking for. I love the container it comes with so I can puree berries and I love the whisk it comes with too because I like to froth milk before using it for hot chocolate. The last piece that comes with it I use to make certain soups that you puree some of the veggies for and you can do it directly in the pot instead of using the container. I definitely recommend this, you get way more for the price and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for the price. I wore out a Braun and needed to buy another. My *must* is the whipper, and it functions well. I would suggest hand-washing that piece, as it's the first part that wore out for me on my Braun. The chopper bowl is an excellent size and closes securely. If you can afford to buy one with more speeds, I'd encourage you to do that. If you're on a budget like I am, I believe this will satisfy your gadget ye.
customer_reviews.author: L. Link

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea, bad follow through.
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of the blender with all the attachments but I am disappointed with how they hook in and fail to lock into place. I used the whisk to try and whip heavy cream into whipped cream. After only a minute the whisk attachment fell off. I have not used mini chopper or blender yet but they seem to hook in the same way( or fail to) I am still deciding if I can make these stay on or if I will have to return this as I have only had it one day.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy
customer_reviews.text: The immersion blender is extremely heavy to hold. I'm only 5 feet, so it's very "tall'. I've used it once, but I'll see if I have any future problems.
customer_reviews.author: Poohie

customer_reviews.title: Great little hand blender, nice and compact, fits in a drawer.
customer_reviews.text: Great little hand blender! I have a small kitchen so I appreciate it's compact size, and it fits in a drawer for convenient access. The larger bowl (?) doesn't fit in the drawer obviously, but I don't use it very often anyway. Great little appliance!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristel

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not the best hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as my old Braun, but the price is right. The mini food processor is not the best: noisey, and incomplete chopping, but can be handy for small batches. We'll use the whisk to make mayonnaise, fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shenton

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy
customer_reviews.text: I use this more than I ever thought I would. I just wish I didn't have to continue to hold down the button to get it to function. But it is probably better that it doesn't for my clumsy self, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: The chopping bowl broke the first time I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: The chopping bowl broke the first time I used it. The blender spins but doesn't turn the blade so it must be broken somewhere inside the chopping bowl lid.
customer_reviews.author: Carolan Ivey

customer_reviews.title: powerful and the extra attachments are HANDY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the emersion blender and ended up falling in love with the choping bowl, after initially writing it off as another useless kitchen gadget attachment! So far the choping bowl has impressed me by helping me with oreo and graham cracker crust making and then also copycat Blizzards and fruit smoothies...i was shocked at the power and the textures it produced! So easy to use, the little extra space used, to keep it handy, is totally worth it! I think I could agree that sticking to small batches would be best to increase its life. I even gave the whisk a try and I like it as well!!! ♡♡♡
customer_reviews.author: rockinthegarden

customer_reviews.title: I do love the bonus mixer and
customer_reviews.text: I use this 3-4 times a day, I use this to make my protein shake powder and it has definitely made the process much easier and faster! I do love the bonus mixer and cutter
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: a regular usage that lasts more than 30 seconds sounds like a dramatic effort
customer_reviews.text: It works, and it's ok for the money it costs. But actually I don't think it will last long. Its engine is not very powerful; a regular usage that lasts more than 30 seconds sounds like a dramatic effort.
customer_reviews.author: cp3014@nyu.edu

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase. Current batches are faulty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same model 2 years ago and I am still using it without any worries. I was more than happy with the purchase so ordered a new one as I was moving to a new place. I am on 3rd replacement blender in 2 weeks and all of them are having same issues of faulty rotating mechanism for whipping extension. It makes grinding noise and smells like it is burning. I am tired of sending all those returns back to amazon. UPS guys near my home knows me by my name now.
customer_reviews.author: Anand C

customer_reviews.title: Great pack, I never use the whisk - more trouble than it’s worth.
customer_reviews.text: Love the stainless steel. Didn’t think I’d use the chopper/food processor at all but I use it all the time. The whisk isn’t great for small amounts of liquid, 1-2 eggs isnt worth it because it splatters everywhere, immersion works better for that.
customer_reviews.author: Che Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: Has problems chopping dry onions, and the whisk is ok
customer_reviews.text: The hand blender and chopper are great, though with some types of onions that have thin layers, the chopper leaves full layers that are not chopped. I used the blender in a boiling soup pot and it worked great. The whisk part is very useful if you want to avoid taking out a big mixer and just whisk small portions. However, the results might not be the same - egg did not become perfectly fluffed as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: This little stick blender works great and is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Null

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my use
customer_reviews.text: Used this to blend up 12 different liquid products into one batch, it worked well. Haven’t used it for anything food related.
customer_reviews.author: Nic A.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, handy, and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this hand blender. This is my second one. Through no fault or defect of the product I ruined the immersion blender attachment of my first one (oops!). I could have re-ordered just that piece from Hamilton Beach, but for a few dollars more I have a whole new set PLUS the mini food processor attachment. 90% of the time I use this product to make baby food. It's powerful enough to puree roast pork, green beans, strawberries... basically anything I throw at it. It's also so much more convenient than pulling out the full size food processor and having to wash all the pieces afterward. Buy one, you will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to perform tasks when cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to perform tasks when cooking. The attachments are easy to clean, easy to use and are strong. I have had this over a year now and the container plastic is still stainless & free of any smells. The top latches on very well and the blades are still sharp. The whisk has doubled as a hand whisk and saved me of purchasing a separate one when I use it handheld. My father-in-law loved it so I bought him one!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: This has worked okay for me so far but I don't know how it will survive over the long haul. There are parts that seem on the flimsy side. The bowl for blending works okay but only works well if it is half full. I will continue to try to use it as I make high protein smoothies each day and hope that it will continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The blender I received was obviously a return from a previous buyer. When I opened the box all the pieces were there but the blender and attachments were all dirty. Because I was in a time crunch I did not have the luxury of time to send it back. The blender worked fine so I spent a good amount of time cleaning and sanitizing it so I could use it. Other than the unsanitary condition I received it I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Belanger

customer_reviews.title: well working till now
customer_reviews.text: Havent been using so much yet to make a good review, but in this little time it seemed to be better working than other in the same price range I have worked with. I still think is a good deal, specially for the accessories it offers at a very competitive price Being happy or not with this kind of products is all up to your knowledge of their limits and knowing what to do and what not to do with this appliances
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Masolini

customer_reviews.title: so the whisk tool is almost useless
customer_reviews.text: Slower speed is still very fast, so the whisk tool is almost useless
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Lear

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, powerful, convenient, easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: My Hamilton beach 2 speed blender has worked wonderfully so far. I have used it to make Italian dressing, home made mayonnaise, and pureeing onions and garlic. The blender is light weight and easy to handle. The motor is powerful and has never bogged down. The cord is a good length for me 5-6 feet. The blending head stays very secure during use and twist off for very easy washing. I only wish I had bought this sooner! I cannot comment on the chopper or whisk as I have not had the chance to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: MedStu83

customer_reviews.title: Annoyingly Loud
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well, construction feels okay. There was a slight smell of burning electronics for the first couple uses. I'm assuming that's just standard. My biggest concern is that it's LOUD. Like REALLY loud, especially when using the whisk. It's a really piercing high pitched squealing motor sound. I guess I've just learned to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fadden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of power that you need for an immersion blender and the whisk is the right size for a measuring cup or small mixing bowl. I've already used the immersion blender in a large glass so it's quite compact. As for quality, I can see this lasting quite a while & for $20, you really can't go wrong. Even the chopper does an adequate job. Save money here and buy this; I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved product in timely manner, but it was all beaten up. The chopping bowl looks as if it has been used already, scuff marks, and dents in plastic. Very disappointed. I used the whisk today and was very flimsy, but got the job done. Weight of the handle is alright. It gets the job done, but was definitely expecting something much better.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cordero

customer_reviews.title: This product is great I use it multiple times a week
customer_reviews.text: This product is great I use it multiple times a week. I use the stick blender to make protein shakes, mayonnaise, and ranch dressing. I use the mini food processor to make pickle relish and to chop mushrooms, and onions. The wisk is a great option also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 stick blenders and this is my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan. The motor isn't very powerful, so the whisk barely does the speed needed to whip. The food processor portion does not seal very well at all, and doesn't shop well at all. The stick blender blade is too close to the cover to allow fro anything more than maybe 1/8 of an inch to be blended.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fast or really fast
customer_reviews.text: There are only 2 speeds on this blender, fast, and let's through everything out of the bowl, I like the enthusiasm, but I like my ingredients to stay in the bowl
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Peed

customer_reviews.title: Not good for milkshakes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this thinking we could use to make milkshakes. It doesn't really work well for that........not sure what it would work on as it's been sitting unused in a cabinet for months :(
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Southern Living

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I guess this item maybe two or three times but the last time that I used it a piece of it broke so there's that
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nash

customer_reviews.title: Super Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Super Powerful hand blender. In fact, The most powerful hand blender I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mixer. Bought it to replace a Braun I’d had for many years. Very powerful, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Reveal

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok for 3.5 years
customer_reviews.text: The motor gave out after 3.5 years of light usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are definitely probably sturdier and better quality handheld mixers
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely probably sturdier and better quality handheld mixers, but this was a pretty decent bang for my buck given the additional attachments. The mixer blade is kind of dangerous, but that's more so due to me being aloof in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JADE H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Every home needs an immersion blender! The do everything from salsa to mashed potatoes, quickly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: I bought for son but i may get it too
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son and he's really enjoyed it. Said it not noisy and like the extra attachment for chopping and whipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud Blender
customer_reviews.text: This hand blender is a bit loud. I have another Hamilton Beach hand blender (blender alone) and it isn't nearly as loud as this one.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Good hand blender, food processor attachment was very small.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. The food processor attachment is VERY small, a bit too small for my needs but I'm sure I can find something to do with it. Otherwise I am really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: This is super handy!
customer_reviews.text: With all the attachments, this is the most functional hand blender I've ever owned. It takes up very little space and it perfect for my little family. From baking to cooking all my blending and processing needs are met. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better
customer_reviews.text: I use it every 20 days. It is powerful but I don’t think it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this... One example: I large chopped my carrots, put them in the food processor cup, and hit the high speed for approximately 5 seconds. It minced them. :o This saves me an amazing amount of time on prep. It chops onions in one pulse. It's very easy to clean - I just rinse it immediately after use. I've also made mayo with it - works great. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: This immersion blender is perfect: 1
customer_reviews.text: My husband does not care for what he calls frivolous kitchen items that take up a lot of space. This immersion blender is perfect: 1. It is small to store, so doesn't take up much cabinet space. 2. It is easy to use and quick to change attachments. 3. It is dishwasher safe. I have used this to make anything from salsa to salad dressing to chicken salad. And will soon use it to make baby food. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mtrompler

customer_reviews.title: The machine and blade rod seperates on its own when ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine and blade rod seperates on its own when still working with it.i have to keep holding it...so they dont seperate..
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: This is the best little mixer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little mixer ever. I make a lot of omelets and this makes them nice and fluffy. The best part is the beater part detaches so you can put it in the dishwasher. The small container is great for making hummus. I bought one as a gift also. Love it
customer_reviews.author: scholzy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - excellent price
customer_reviews.text: love my new blender - took a little bit to get used to so I wasn't splashing the walls with whatever I was blending - but now it's all good
customer_reviews.author: serenity.now

customer_reviews.title: This is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite kitchen tool. Whenever I mentioned that I'd like an immersion blender I was told they don't work very well. Those people apparently didn't have the Hamilton Beach 2 speed Hand Blender. I recommend using it with quart size wide mouth mason jars.
customer_reviews.author: BLKS

customer_reviews.title: Smoke came out.
customer_reviews.text: After few months of use. Smoke coming out from the motor.
customer_reviews.author: H. H.

customer_reviews.title: As a Chef I do....
customer_reviews.text: Classically trained Chef. This great for any home wannabe Chef. I highly recommended this
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth X Havriliak

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Needed an inexpensive hand blender to use at rental house. Worked fine for my needs, i.e., whipping cream and small amount of stirring and blending various dips, etc. Not as sturdy or as versatile as my cuisinart hand blender but definitely just what I needed for the time we were there
customer_reviews.author: mom5

customer_reviews.title: This mixer is great in every way except the noise level
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is great in every way except the noise level. It is uncomfortably loud! I have had a lot of stick mixers and this one is just too loud. It actually hurts my ears. I am not sensitive to noise. It's too bad because it works well. I guess I'll have to wear ear plugs when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goings

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 59765 Immersion Hand Blender with Blending Wand, Whisk and 3-Cup Food Chopping Bowl, 3-Piece, Silver and Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The convenient Hamilton Beach Hand Blender comes with a whisk and chopping bowl to meet all of your blending, mixing and chopping needs. All attachments are dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: One Tool Does It All: Immersion Blender Lets You Blend, Mix, Whip, Puree and Chop With One 2-Speed Kitchen Multi-Tool.

Attachments Included: Hand Mixer Has 3 Attachments That Fit on the Power Stick: Stainless Steel Blending Wand, Stainless Steel Whisk Attachment and 3-Cup Chopping Bowl Attachment With Stainless Steel Blades.
Chops Right in the Bowl: No Need for Another Bowl—Conveniently Chop Right in This Hand Blender’s Included 3-Cup Chopping Bowl Attachment.
Simple Cleanup: Hand Mixer's Blending Wand, Whisk and Chopping Bowl Attachments Are Dishwasher Safe.
225 Watt Motor: Powerful Enough for All Your Blending, Mixing and Chopping Needs.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
